name: Legionnaire's Nature
text: When main weapon: MC gains <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_Lethal_Attack_Dodged.png|25px|link=Guts]][[Guts|Guts (1 time)]]<span class="tooltiptext">Can withstand lethal DMG (Leaves 1 HP)<br /><span class="hr"></span>Also called "Lethal Attack Dodged"</span></span></span>.<br/>MC gains a 30% chance to gain a [[Substitute]] effect.

name: Legionnaire's Humanity
text: When main weapon: 20% boost to max HP (MC only).

name: Legionnaire's Divinity
text: When main weapon: Gain <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_Substitute.png|25px|link=Substitute]][[Substitute|Substitute]]<span class="tooltiptext">Receives foe attack in place of an ally<br />(Excludes all-foe all-ally attacks)<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 1 turn </span></span></span> effect for 1 turn upon using <span class="image_link">[[File:Ability_Attract.png|25px|link=Spartan#Extended_Mastery_Skills]]&nbsp;<span class="tooltip">[[Spartan#Extended_Mastery_Skills|Guardian]]<span class="tooltiptext">Gain <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_DefenseUp.png|25px|link=DEF Up]][[DEF Up|DEF Up]]<span class="tooltiptext">DEF is boosted<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 3 turns</span></span></span> and <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_AggroUpArrow.png|25px|link=Hostility]][[Hostility|Hostility Up]]<span class="tooltiptext">More likely to be attacked<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Strength</strong>: 50<span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 3 turns</span></span></span>.<br />(Consumes 30% of charge bar.)</span></span></span>.

name: Legionnaire's Devilry
text: When main weapon: Also grant <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status Shield.png|25px|link=Shield]][[Shield|Shield (2000)]]<span class="tooltiptext">Next ATK received will be ineffective for a fixed amount<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Strength</strong>: 2000<span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 3 turns</span></span></span> to target ally upon using <span class="image_link">[[File:Ability_Invincible.png|25px|link=Spartan#Extended_Mastery_Skills]]&nbsp;<span class="tooltip">[[Spartan#Extended_Mastery_Skills|Centurion II]]<span class="tooltiptext">Target ally gains <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_Repel.png|25px|link=Unchallenged]][[Unchallenged|Unchallenged (1 time)]]<span class="tooltiptext">Next DMG received will be ineffective<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 3 turns</span></span></span>.</span></span></span>.

name: Legionnaire's Essence
text: This is the essence of greatness. Gain its power by using emblems.

text: When main weapon: Also grant <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status Shield.png|25px|link=Shield]][[Shield|Shield (2000)]]<span class="tooltiptext">Next ATK received will be ineffective for a fixed amount<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Strength</strong>: 2000<span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 3 turns</span></span></span> to target ally upon using <span class="image_link">[[File:Ability_Invincible.png|25px|link=Spartan#Extended_Mastery_Skills]]&nbsp;<span class="tooltip">[[Spartan#Extended_Mastery_Skills|Centurion II]]<span class="tooltiptext">Target ally gains <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_Repel.png|25px|link=Unchallenged]][[Unchallenged|Unchallenged (1 time)]]<span class="tooltiptext">Next DMG received will be ineffective<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 3 turns</span></span></span>.</span></span></span>.

DMG Up (1 time)]]<span class="tooltiptext">Charge attack DMG is boosted (1 time)<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Strength</strong>: 45%<span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: Indefinite</span></span></span> upon using <span class="image_link">[[File:Ability Swan Song.png|25px|link=Apsaras#Extended_Mastery_Skills]]&nbsp;<span class="tooltip">[[Apsaras#Extended_Mastery_Skills|Swan Song]]<span class="tooltiptext">All parties gain <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_Uplift.png|25px|link=Charge Bar Gain Boosted]][[Charge Bar Gain Boosted|10% Charge Bar Gain Up]]<span class="tooltiptext">[[Charge bar]] gain is boosted<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Strength</strong>: 10%<span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 3 turns</span></span></span>.<br />'''Spear:''' All parties gain <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_CriticalUp.png|25px|link=Critical Hit Rate Boosted]][[Critical Hit Rate Boosted|80% / 20% Critical Hit Rate Up]]<span class="tooltiptext">Attacks made with elemental superiority have a chance to deal boosted DMG<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Strength</strong>: 80% chance of dealing 20% more damage.<span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 3 turns</span></span></span>.<br />'''Axe:''' All allies gain <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status_1180.png|25px|link=Drain]][[Drain|Drain]]<span class="tooltiptext">Normal attack and C.A. DMG dealt is partially absorbed to HP<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Strength</strong>: (Healing cap: 800)<span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 3 turns</span></span></span> and <span class="image_link"><span class="tooltip" style="border-bottom: 0;">[[File:Status DebuffSuccessUp.png|25px|link=Debuff Success Boosted]][[Debuff Success Boosted|10% Debuff Success Boosted]]<span class="tooltiptext">Debuff success rate is boosted<br /><span class="hr"></span><strong>Strength</strong>: 10%<span class="hr"></span><strong>Duration</strong>: 3 turns</span></span></span>.</span></span></span>
